mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jiaotong_results (id, task_id, road_id, travel_time, average_speed, speed_confidence, traffic_flow, flow_confidence) VALUES (seq_jiaotong_results_id.nextval, #{taskId}, #{roadSectionId}, #{travelTime}, #{averageSpeed}, #{averageSpeedConfidence}, #{trafficFlow}, #{trafficFlowConfidence})
